title: Just Shapes & Beats Download Direct Link
description:
Get Just Shapes & Beats PC game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
The most important feature of this game is the musical background. The passage of each level is accompanied by music in this game, and your every action will be performed in rhythm with sound accompaniment. On the one hand, it’s not such a feature, but on the other hand, it is the music and thoughtful gameplay that create an atmosphere in Just Shapes & Beats that you simply cannot help but be delighted with. Moreover, depending on your actions and behavior, the music in the game changes, some rhythms are replaced by others, others become even stronger, and then decline. Wallpaper Engine

system_requirements.Graphics: DirectX 11-compatible graphics card with at least 512MB of video memory
